languages.text: "А теперь..." {n}Тон и поза Маражая моментально меняются — он опускает голову и смотрит на вас снизу вверх со странной, почти игривой покорностью.{/n} "Я жажду пиршества, {name}. Сейчас. Немедленно. Дозволишь ли ты?..."

"And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"
languages.original_text: "А теперь..." {n}Тон и поза Маражая моментально меняются — он опускает голову и смотрит на вас снизу вверх со странной, почти игривой покорностью.{/n} "Я жажду пиршества, {name}. Сейчас. Немедленно. Дозволишь ли ты?..."

traits.locale_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

"And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

"And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

"And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

languages.text: “至于现在……”{n}玛拉斋的语气和姿态瞬间变了。他低下头，抬头看着你，表现出近乎嬉戏的顺从。{/n}“我渴望享受一场盛宴，{name}，现在就要。你允许我这么做吗？”
languages.original_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

traits.locale_text: “至于现在……”{n}玛拉斋的语气和姿态瞬间变了。他低下头，抬头看着你，表现出近乎嬉戏的顺从。{/n}“我渴望享受一场盛宴，{name}，现在就要。你允许我这么做吗？”

languages.text: 「今は…」{n}マラズハイの口調と態度が瞬時に変わった。ふざけて召使いのような態度で、頭を下げてこちらを見上げる。{/n}「宴が欲しい、{name}。今すぐに。いいだろう？」
languages.original_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

traits.locale_text: 「今は…」{n}マラズハイの口調と態度が瞬時に変わった。ふざけて召使いのような態度で、頭を下げてこちらを見上げる。{/n}「宴が欲しい、{name}。今すぐに。いいだろう？」

languages.text: «Y ahora...». {n}El tono y la postura de Marazhai cambian al instante; agacha la cabeza y levanta la vista hacia ti en un gesto casi juguetón de sumisión.{/n} «Deseo darme un festín, {name}. Ahora. De inmediato. ¿Tengo tu permiso?».
languages.original_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora...». {n}El tono y la postura de Marazhai cambian al instante; agacha la cabeza y levanta la vista hacia ti en un gesto casi juguetón de sumisión.{/n} «Deseo darme un festín, {name}. Ahora. De inmediato. ¿Tengo tu permiso?».

languages.text: « Sur ce... » {n}Le ton et la posture de Marazhai changent instantanément : il baisse la tête et vous regarde par en dessous dans une démonstration de soumission mâtinée d'espièglerie.{/n} « Je meurs d'envie de festoyer, {name}. Là, maintenant, tout de suite. Ai-je votre permission ? »
languages.original_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

traits.locale_text: « Sur ce... » {n}Le ton et la posture de Marazhai changent instantanément : il baisse la tête et vous regarde par en dessous dans une démonstration de soumission mâtinée d'espièglerie.{/n} « Je meurs d'envie de festoyer, {name}. Là, maintenant, tout de suite. Ai-je votre permission ? »

languages.text: "Und jetzt ..." {n}Augenblicklich ändern sich Marazhais Tonfall und Haltung – er zieht den Kopf ein und blickt zu dir auf, um fast spielerisch seine Unterwürfigkeit zu zeigen.{/n} "Ich giere nach einem Fest, {name}. Jetzt. Sofort. Habe ich dafür Eure Erlaubnis?"
languages.original_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

traits.locale_text: "Und jetzt ..." {n}Augenblicklich ändern sich Marazhais Tonfall und Haltung – er zieht den Kopf ein und blickt zu dir auf, um fast spielerisch seine Unterwürfigkeit zu zeigen.{/n} "Ich giere nach einem Fest, {name}. Jetzt. Sofort. Habe ich dafür Eure Erlaubnis?"

languages.text: "Şimdiyse..." {n}Marazhai'ın ses tonuyla duruşu, aniden değişiyor. Kafasını eğerek neredeyse oyunbaz bir itaatkârlık gösterisiyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ziyafet arzuluyorum {name}. Şimdi. Hemen şu an. Bana izin veriyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "And now..." {n}Marazhai's tone and posture instantly shift — he ducks his head and looks up at you in a show of almost playful submissiveness.{/n} "I hunger for a feast, {name}. Now. Immediately. Do I have your permission?"

traits.locale_text: "Şimdiyse..." {n}Marazhai'ın ses tonuyla duruşu aniden değişiyor. Kafasını eğerek neredeyse oyunbaz bir itaatkârlık gösterisiyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ziyafet arzuluyorum {name}. Şimdi. Hemen şu an. Bana izin veriyor musun?"
